activities:
Time Warner Business Services, LLC may collect and use Personal Data from its past, present and prospective employees, their beneficiaries, dependents, and emergency contacts, and vendors, for the following purposes (the databases and/or systems where this data resides are noted in parentheses, all of which are managed and hosted by Time Warner Inc. except where noted with an asterisk, which are independently owned and managed by a third Party):

•	Human resources functions including training, career and succession planning, implementing employee-related actions and obligations and providing employment benefits and related information (HRIS Administration; Human Resources Data Central and Reporting; PeopleSoft; Personnel Action Form)
•	Human Capital Management (Enterprise Data Warehouse, Open Text*; Service Now*, Workday*); 
•       Electronic Communication (Outlook, People Directory); and
•	Recruitment & Hiring Activities (Brass Ring*)
address: 3111 West Martin Luther King, Jr. Blvd
contactoff1: Director, Privacy & Information Security Time Warner Inc. on behalf of Time Warner Business Services
corpofftitle1: Vice President and Chief Information Officer
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization data and vendor contact information.  Yes, the data covered includes manually processed data.
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
